# UI TripleD

> Production-ready UI components, blocks, and pages built on top of shadcn/ui and Framer Motion.

**Last Updated:** 2025-12-17T19:16:10.566Z

## Table of Contents

- Components (164 items)
- Blocks (73 items)
- Pages (23 items)
- UI Elements (19 items)

### Components

- [Accessible Image Slider Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/image-slider-card): Image carousel card with keyboard support, reduced motion handling, and screen reader-friendly labels
- [Animated Card Stack](https://ui.tripled.work/components/animated-card-stack-baseui): Stacked cards that expand on hover (Base UI)
- [Animated Card Stack](https://ui.tripled.work/components/animated-card-stack-shadcnui): Stacked cards that expand on hover
- [Cards Slider](https://ui.tripled.work/components/cards-slider): Liquid smooth draggable cards slider with shadcn/ui styling and framer-motion animations
- [Cinema Ticket](https://ui.tripled.work/components/cinema-ticket-baseui): Cinematic theater ticket with rip effect and barcode (Base UI)
- [Cinema Ticket](https://ui.tripled.work/components/cinema-ticket-shadcnui): Cinematic theater ticket with rip effect and barcode
- [Conference Ticket](https://ui.tripled.work/components/conference-ticket-baseui): Animated conference ticket with glassmorphism effects and holographic details (Base UI)
- [Conference Ticket](https://ui.tripled.work/components/conference-ticket-shadcnui): Animated conference ticket with glassmorphism effects and holographic details
- [Credit Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/credit-card-baseui): 3D animated credit card with flip animation to show CVV (Base UI)
- [Credit Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/credit-card-shadcnui): 3D animated credit card with flip animation to show CVV
- [Detail Task Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/detail-task-card-baseui): Task management detail panel with animated assignee chips and editor controls (Base UI)
- [Detail Task Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/detail-task-card-shadcnui): Task management detail panel with animated assignee chips and editor controls
- [Ecommerce Highlight Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/ecommerce-highlight-card-baseui): Product spotlight card with blurred border, bundle selector, and fulfillment details (Base UI)
- [Ecommerce Highlight Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/ecommerce-highlight-card-shadcnui): Product spotlight card with blurred border, bundle selector, and fulfillment details
- [Glass Blog Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/glass-blog-card-baseui): Glassmorphism blog card with image zoom, author info, and read action (Base UI)
- [Glass Blog Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/glass-blog-card-shadcnui): Glassmorphism blog card with image zoom, author info, and read action
- [Glass Checkout Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/glass-checkout-card-baseui): Glassmorphism checkout card with payment method selector and input fields (Base UI)
- [Glass Checkout Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/glass-checkout-card-shadcnui): Glassmorphism checkout card with payment method selector and input fields
- [Glass Order Summary](https://ui.tripled.work/components/glass-order-summary-baseui): Glassmorphism order summary card with item list and checkout button (Base UI)
- [Glass Order Summary](https://ui.tripled.work/components/glass-order-summary-shadcnui): Glassmorphism order summary card with item list and checkout button
- [Glass Wallet Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/glass-wallet-card-baseui): Glassmorphism crypto wallet card with balance, trend, and action buttons (Base UI)
- [Glass Wallet Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/glass-wallet-card-shadcnui): Glassmorphism crypto wallet card with balance, trend, and action buttons
- [Hover Expand Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/hover-expand-card-baseui): Card that lifts and expands on hover (Base UI)
- [Hover Expand Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/hover-expand-card-shadcnui): Card that lifts and expands on hover
- [Project Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/project-card-baseui): Glassmorphism project card with links, tags, and hover effects (Base UI)
- [Project Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/project-card-shadcnui): Glassmorphism project card with links, tags, and hover effects
- [Theater Ticket](https://ui.tripled.work/components/theater-ticket-baseui): Cinematic theater ticket with rip effect and barcode (Base UI)
- [Theater Ticket](https://ui.tripled.work/components/theater-ticket-shadcnui): Cinematic theater ticket with rip effect and barcode

#### Components

##### Chat

- [AI Chat Interface](https://ui.tripled.work/components/ai-chat-interface): Chat input with attachments, model selector, and accessible controls
- [Chat App](https://ui.tripled.work/components/chat-app): Fully functional chat interface with animated messages
- [Floating Chat Widget](https://ui.tripled.work/components/floating-chat-widget): Floating chat widget with AI agent selection dropdown and animations
- [Messenger](https://ui.tripled.work/components/messenger): Glassmorphism messenger workspace with accessible motion and quick replies

- [AI Loading Skeleton](https://ui.tripled.work/components/ai-loading-skeleton): Loading state with diagonal shimmer gradient and opacity wave
- [AI Response Typing Stream](https://ui.tripled.work/components/ai-response-typing): Character-by-character typing animation with natural pauses and thinking states
- [Animated Accordion](https://ui.tripled.work/components/animated-accordion): Accordion with smooth expand/collapse and rotate arrow
- [Animated Navbar](https://ui.tripled.work/components/animated-navbar): Navigation bar with animated underline indicator
- [Animated Pagination](https://ui.tripled.work/components/animated-pagination): Pagination with smooth page transition indicator
- [Animated Profile Menu](https://ui.tripled.work/components/animated-profile-menu): Floating profile avatar that reveals quick action cards with smooth motion
- [Animated Sidebar](https://ui.tripled.work/components/animated-sidebar): Sidebar with slide-in animation and overlay
- [Animated Tooltip](https://ui.tripled.work/components/animated-tooltip): Tooltip with delay and slide animation
- [Avatar Group](https://ui.tripled.work/components/avatar-group): Stacked avatar group with hover reveal and tooltips
- [Blog Typography](https://ui.tripled.work/components/blog-typography): Beautiful blog post typography with text, links, images, blockquotes, and code examples
- [Browse Folder](https://ui.tripled.work/components/browse-folder-baseui): Folder browser with animated tabs and content (Base UI)
- [Browse Folder](https://ui.tripled.work/components/browse-folder-shadcnui): Folder browser with animated tabs and content
- [Command Palette](https://ui.tripled.work/components/command-palette): Command palette with search and keyboard navigation
- [Comment Thread](https://ui.tripled.work/components/comment-thread): Nested comment thread with rich interactions and animations
- [Context Menu](https://ui.tripled.work/components/context-menu): Right-click context menu with nested items animation
- [Context Menu Bubble](https://ui.tripled.work/components/context-menu-bubble): Right-click reveals circular expanding radial menu with icons
- [Course Content Page](https://ui.tripled.work/components/course-content-page): Interactive course page with video player, instructor details, curriculum sections, and progress tracking
- [Currency Converter Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/currency-converter-card-baseui): Finance conversion widget with animated inputs, simulated exchange updates, and contextual feedback (Base UI)
- [Currency Converter Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/currency-converter-card-shadcnui): Finance conversion widget with animated inputs, simulated exchange updates, and contextual feedback
- [Drag-to-Confirm Slider](https://ui.tripled.work/components/drag-to-confirm-slider): Slider that activates action only when fully dragged to end
- [Expanding Search Dock](https://ui.tripled.work/components/expanding-search-dock): Minimal search icon that expands into full input with blur
- [Glassmorphism Statistics Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/glassmorphism-statistics-card-baseui): Interactive statistics card with hover reveal and smooth transitions (Base UI)
- [Glassmorphism Statistics Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/glassmorphism-statistics-card-shadcnui): Interactive statistics card with hover reveal and smooth transitions
- [Interactive Timeline](https://ui.tripled.work/components/interactive-timeline): Vertical timeline where elements animate and connect with lines on scroll
- [Mac Searchbar](https://ui.tripled.work/components/mac-searchbar): Mac-style searchbar with animated dropdown, glassmorphism effects, and smooth transitions
- [Magnetic Avatar Group](https://ui.tripled.work/components/magnetic-avatar-group): Stacked avatars that spread apart on hover showing tooltips
- [Multiple Accounts Switcher](https://ui.tripled.work/components/multiple-accounts): Glassmorphic account switcher with animated dropdown and accessible listbox controls
- [News Feed](https://ui.tripled.work/components/news-feed): Interactive news feed with categories, search, and animated cards
- [Projects Block](https://ui.tripled.work/components/projects-block-baseui): Animated project card with hover effects, image zoom, and link buttons (Base UI)
- [Projects Block](https://ui.tripled.work/components/projects-block-shadcnui): Animated project card with hover effects, image zoom, and link buttons
- [Smart Hover Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/smart-hover-card): Card that detects cursor direction and reveals content from that side
- [Stacked Card Carousel](https://ui.tripled.work/components/stacked-card-carousel): Three stacked cards that shift and tilt dynamically on hover
- [Synced Lyric Captions](https://ui.tripled.work/components/synced-lyric-captions): Bottom-to-top timed captions with play/pause controls and optional audio sync for songs or voiceovers.
- [Volume Component](https://ui.tripled.work/components/volume-component): A smooth, draggable volume slider component with framer-motion animations and shadcn styling.
- [Weather Dashboard](https://ui.tripled.work/components/weather-dashboard): Immersive weather dashboard with hourly charting, weekly outlook, and live air-quality alerts
- [Web Performance Page](https://ui.tripled.work/components/web-performance-page): Real-time analysis of web vitals and performance metrics

##### Dropdown

- [Staggered Dropdown](https://ui.tripled.work/components/staggered-dropdown): Dropdown menu with staggered item animations

##### Forms

- [Animated Checkbox](https://ui.tripled.work/components/animated-checkbox): Checkbox with checkmark animation
- [Animated Radio](https://ui.tripled.work/components/animated-radio): Radio button group with selection ripple
- [Animated Select](https://ui.tripled.work/components/animated-select): Select dropdown with smooth open/close animation
- [Glass Account Settings Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/glass-account-settings-card): Account management card with subscription overview and billing actions in glassmorphic style
- [Glass Forgot Password Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/glass-forgot-password-card): Reset-password screen with glassmorphic styling and status messaging
- [Glass Profile Settings Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/glass-profile-settings-card): Glassmorphic profile settings form with avatar upload, bio, and notification preferences
- [Glass Sign-In Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/glass-sign-in-card): Glassmorphic sign-in panel with social auth buttons and email form
- [Glass Sign-Up Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/glass-sign-up-card): Glassmorphic sign-up flow with social providers, email fields, and terms checkbox
- [Glass Verification Code Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/glass-verification-code-card): Verification code entry with glassmorphic inputs, status messaging, and reduced-motion support
- [Simple Calendar](https://ui.tripled.work/components/simple-calendar): Calendar picker with date selection animation

##### Inputs

- [AI Glow Input](https://ui.tripled.work/components/ai-glow-input): Input field with dynamic glow that pulses based on typing speed - smart motion feedback
- [Floating Label Input](https://ui.tripled.work/components/floating-label-input): Input with animated floating label
- [Password Input](https://ui.tripled.work/components/password-input): Password input with toggle visibility and strength indicator

##### Lists

- [Animated List](https://ui.tripled.work/components/animated-list): List with staggered item animations
- [Draggable List](https://ui.tripled.work/components/draggable-list): Reorderable list with drag and drop spring physics

##### Modal

- [Animated Dialog](https://ui.tripled.work/components/animated-dialog): Modal dialog with backdrop fade and spring animation
- [Fade & Slide Modal](https://ui.tripled.work/components/fade-slide-modal): Modal with fade backdrop and slide-up animation
- [Fluid Modal Transition](https://ui.tripled.work/components/fluid-modal-transition): Modal that expands smoothly from clicked trigger element using layoutId

##### Notifications

- [Notification Center](https://ui.tripled.work/components/notification-center): Multi-variant notification stack with accessible announcements, actions, and motion states

##### Tabs

- [Animated Tabs](https://ui.tripled.work/components/animated-tabs): Tabs with sliding indicator animation

- [Wizard Form](https://ui.tripled.work/components/wizard-form): Multi-step wizard form with animated transitions, validation, and progress tracking

- [Bottom Modal](https://ui.tripled.work/components/bottom-modal): Cute bottom-centered modal with smooth slide-up animation and glassmorphism design

### Blocks

- [About Us](https://ui.tripled.work/components/about-us-section-baseui): About us section with value cards, icons, and animated reveal effects (Base UI)

### Pages

#### Page

##### About

- [About Us Page](https://ui.tripled.work/components/about-us-page): Glassmorphism about page showcasing mission, values, and leadership with motion accents.

- [Auto-Revealing Heading](https://ui.tripled.work/components/auto-revealing-heading): Heading that reveals each letter/word with staggered motion on scroll

- [CTA Banner Section](https://ui.tripled.work/components/cta-banner-section-shadcnui): Animated call-to-action banner with gradient background and button animations
- [Dynamic Spotlight CTA](https://ui.tripled.work/components/dynamic-spotlight-cta): Floating spotlight follows cursor to reveal gradient CTA text with premium effects
- [FAQ Section](https://ui.tripled.work/components/faq-section-baseui): Animated FAQ section with expandable questions and smooth transitions (Base UI)
- [FAQ Section](https://ui.tripled.work/components/faq-section-shadcnui): Animated FAQ section with expandable questions and smooth transitions

- [Feature Grid Section](https://ui.tripled.work/components/feature-grid-section-shadcnui): Animated feature grid with staggered card animations and icon reveals

- [Pricing Section](https://ui.tripled.work/components/pricing-section-shadcnui): Animated pricing cards with hover effects and feature lists
- [Profile Page](https://ui.tripled.work/components/profile-page): User profile with gradient cover, stats, and posts feed
- [Scroll Progress Tracker](https://ui.tripled.work/components/scroll-progress-tracker): Fixed progress bar that follows scroll and glows on section changes
- [Scroll Reveal](https://ui.tripled.work/components/scroll-reveal-baseui): Section that animates into view on scroll with intersection observer (Base UI)
- [Scroll Reveal](https://ui.tripled.work/components/scroll-reveal-shadcnui): Section that animates into view on scroll with intersection observer
- [Stats Section](https://ui.tripled.work/components/stats-section-baseui): Animated statistics section with cards and counters (Base UI)
- [Stats Section](https://ui.tripled.work/components/stats-section-shadcnui): Animated statistics section with cards and counters

- [Testimonial Section](https://ui.tripled.work/components/testimonial-section-shadcnui): Carousel-style testimonial section with smooth transitions

### UI Elements

#### Data

##### Charts

- [Accessible Cash Flow Chart](https://ui.tripled.work/components/cash-flow-chart): Interactive cash flow bar chart with keyboard focus, tooltips, and screen reader support

##### Progress

- [Animated Progress Bar](https://ui.tripled.work/components/animated-progress): Progress bar with smooth animation

#### Decorative

##### Background

- [Floating Gradient](https://ui.tripled.work/components/floating-gradient): Animated floating gradient background effect
- [Gradient Animation](https://ui.tripled.work/components/gradient-animation): Smoothly transitioning gradient background
- [Reactive Background Grid](https://ui.tripled.work/components/reactive-background-grid): Background pattern that reacts to mouse movement and click ripples

- [Animated Quote Block](https://ui.tripled.work/components/animated-quote-block): Quote that types itself in, pauses, then subtly breathes
- [Dynamic Tag Cloud](https://ui.tripled.work/components/dynamic-tag-cloud): Floating cluster of tags that drift and rearrange when hovered
- [Floating Info Panel](https://ui.tripled.work/components/floating-info-panel): Info tooltip that drifts up/down while fading in/out intermittently
- [Holographic Wall](https://ui.tripled.work/components/holographic-wall): Black wall with Pharaonic hieroglyphs and golden cursor light reflection
- [Liquid Cursor](https://ui.tripled.work/components/liquid-cursor): A liquid-like cursor effect that mixes colors on movement
- [Spotlight Section](https://ui.tripled.work/components/spotlight-section): Container where mouse creates soft radial spotlight following cursor

#### Micro

##### Buttons

- [Ripple Click Effect](https://ui.tripled.work/components/ripple-click-button): Material design inspired ripple effect on click
- [Scale Hover Button](https://ui.tripled.work/components/scale-hover-button): A button that scales up smoothly on hover
- [Shimmer Button](https://ui.tripled.work/components/shimmer-button): Button with continuous shimmer effect

- [AI Unlock Animation](https://ui.tripled.work/components/ai-unlock-animation): Premium unlock animation with particles, ripples, and loading states
- [Mood Gradient Button](https://ui.tripled.work/components/mood-gradient-button): Button with background gradient that shifts based on hover angle

##### Icons

- [Heart Favorite](https://ui.tripled.work/components/heart-favorite): Animated heart icon for like/favorite actions

##### Links

- [Preview Details Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/preview-details-card): Link card that reveals a smooth detail preview box on hover

##### Toggles

- [Elastic Toggle Switch](https://ui.tripled.work/components/elastic-switch): Toggle switch with elastic spring animation
